Achievements & Activities

Celebrating excellence in academics, sports, cultural activities, and social initiatives.

Our Achievement Categories

Explore our diverse achievements and activities across various domains.

Academic Achievements

Excellence in academics, competitive exams, and knowledge-based competitions

Sports & Physical Achievements

Championships, medals, and recognition in various sports and physical activities

Cultural Achievements

Excellence in performing arts, visual arts, and cultural competitions

Social Initiatives

Community service, environmental conservation, and social awareness activities

Recent Highlights

Some of our most notable recent achievements across all categories.

Academic

SSLC Results Excellence

98.5% pass rate with 35 distinctions in SSLC examinations 2023-24

Sports

State Kabaddi Champions

School Kabaddi team won the State Championship defeating 32 teams

Cultural

Folk Dance Competition Winners

First prize at State Level Cultural Festival for traditional folk dance

Social

Village Cleanliness Drive

Transformed neighboring villages through student-led cleanliness initiative

Academic

Mathematics Olympiad Success

Five students qualified for National Mathematics Olympiad

Sports

District Athletics - 5 Gold Medals

Students won 5 gold medals in various track and field events
